instructions: Power up your device and wait until you see the home screen displayed on the screen. Scroll down and click on Settings . Go to Preferences . Next, choose Home Screen . Select Apps and Games Rows . Choose either Re-order Apps Row or Re-order Games Row . You will be returned to the relevant row, but with the background grayed out. Use your remote control to reorder the apps. The Select button either selects or deselects an app, the directional buttons move the selected app left or right along the row.
